participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is a creative and introspective individual, navigating the challenges of young adulthood while embracing her vibrant interests.
participant_1.background: i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i've a pet fish.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Oliver is a knowledgeable and passionate person with a deep appreciation for art and nature, always eager to share his interests with others.
participant_2.background: i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home. i'm a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
